text: Hi everyone , I am a 2nd yr UnderGrad Student (CS Major). Interested for Julia GSoC 2021. I have prior programming experience with C, Bash, Python , Java , SQL and Some Python libraries like Pandas,Numpy,MatplotLib,.. and Some experience with DL Framework like Tensorflow . But i don’t  know Julia And it's going to be my First ever contribution  to Open Source. Do i need some more experience to work with Julia Projects?

elements.text: Hi everyone , I am a 2nd yr UnderGrad Student (CS Major). Interested for Julia GSoC 2021. I have prior programming experience with C, Bash, Python , Java , SQL and Some Python libraries like Pandas,Numpy,MatplotLib,.. and Some experience with DL Framework like Tensorflow . But i don’t  know Julia And it's going to be my First ever contribution  to Open Source. Do i need some more experience to work with Julia Projects?

text: No prior experience needed! You probably should learn Julia though.

elements.text: No prior experience needed! You probably should learn Julia though.

text: how do i find and interact with mentor?

elements.text: how do i find and interact with mentor?

text: You can find the names of the mentors on the project ideas list (<https://julialang.org/jsoc/projects/> click the ones you're interested in and you'll see the details) and maybe DM them? (not sure if this is a polite/correct way though)

attachments.text: The official website for the Julia Language. Julia is a language that is fast, dynamic, easy to use, and open source. Click here to learn more.
